short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevTool panel for Chromogen, a UX-driven test generator for Recoil apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Chromogen?
Chromogen is an automatic, interaction-driven test generator for React applications that use the Recoil.js state management library. 

How do I use Chromogen?
After installing the Chromogen npm package, interaction recording and test file downloading are controlled via buttons (rendered by Chromogen) in your application UI. This DevTool panel provides an alternative interface for these buttons.

How can I contribute / report a bug / say hello?
github.com/oslabs-beta/Chromogen / chromogen.app@gmail.com 

IMPORTANT: You must [ npm install Chromogen ] in your app before using this extension.
